thread.title: 25 Reasons John Boyega Is The Best Human Being Of Our Times
thread.title_full: 25 Reasons John Boyega Is The Best Human Being Of Our Times

author: Kimberley Dadds
title: 25 Reasons John Boyega Is The Best Human Being Of Our Times
text:
That laugh. That smile. ID: 10705137 2. And he’s pretty funny about his breakthrough role all the time. Like when his friends finally saw it. View this image › 
NBC ID: 10705153 3. And about his parents learning of the role in the first place… View this image › 
Jimmy Kimmel Live / youtube.com Again, that face <3
ID: 10705185 4. But regardless he is pretty damn adorable when it comes to his mum and dad. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705209 Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705215 5. In fact, he’s just a really lovely family man. Here he is singing his heart out with them at Christmas. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705218 6. He’s funny about bagging the role with J.J. Abrams. https://robbiercyes.tumblr.com/post/137579087707/someone-like-robsten-how-did-j-j-abrams-tell View this embed › 
ID: 10705133 7. And his honesty about being a Star Wars fan is adorable. View this image › 
johnboyegadaily.tumblr.com Never change.
ID: 10705127 8. Like, seriously. https://forcewakens.tumblr.com/post/134608235590/john-boyega-when-he-saw-millennium-falcon View this embed › 
Lucasfilm / youtube.com ID: 10705187 9. His nerdiness for the franchise is admirable. Ethan Miller / Getty Images
E! Online / Via eonline.com 
  ID: 10705200 10. Especially when talking about forgetting that BB-8 isn’t real. View this image › 
youtube.com ID: 10705156 11. And acting out his friendship with her. The press tour got to BB-8 but so glad I was able to help !
— John Boyega (@JohnBoyega) ID: 10705162 12. I mean, look at his reaction to seeing the trailer for the first time. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705172 instagram.com 
instagram.com 
  ID: 10705179 13. He’s a pro at posing with his co-stars. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705168 14. Also, the fact he’s become best pals with Harrison Ford is excellent. View this image › 
Extra TV ID: 10705148 15. They even dine in John’s hometown of Peckham together. View this image › 
BAFTA / youtube.com ID: 10705190 16. And he just really, really, really loves being a Londoner. Back home. I love you London!
— John Boyega (@JohnBoyega) ID: 10705169 He’s proud of his roots and we love him for it. Facebook Post . Facebook: johnboyega ID: 10705146 17. Here he is greeting an old school teacher. @JohnBoyega reconnects with an old teacher! #StarWarsatSTC
— South Thames College (@SouthThamesColl) ID: 10705170 18. He’s a good role model for everyone. View this image › 
BBC / JUSTIN TALLIS/AFP / Getty Images / youtube.com ID: 10705204 19. He had this to say when he was slated for supporting International Women’s Day. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705129 20. And this when he was also targeted about celebrating Black History Month. @theedge60 happy you can celebrate it too month with a side of ssshhh
— John Boyega (@JohnBoyega) ID: 10705143 21. He’s not afraid to show how excited he can get at things like the Star Wars premiere. Something tells us @JohnBoyega is excited to be here at #TheForceAwakens European Premiere... #FinnAwakens https://t.co/fDBB1mLsec
— Star Wars UK (@StarWarsUK) ID: 10705131 22. And he also excites his fans by surprising them at screenings. Two unsuspecting SW fans watching the trailer before the movie. Had to interrupt.
— John Boyega (@JohnBoyega) ID: 10705145 Because he’s the best. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705164 23. He’s also best pals with co-star Daisy Ridley, aka Rey, and his anecdotes about their relationship are the best. https://rafikecoyote.tumblr.com/post/142644975343 View this embed › 
ID: 10705160 24. He’s pretty humble to boot. View this image › 
1Xtra ID: 10705181 25. And because THIS is how he’s celebrating his birthday this week. Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10719644 Happy birthday, John! Loading View on Instagram 
Instagram: @jboyega_ ID: 10705220 Long may you be the star that you are. ID: 10719688 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Kimberley Dadds is the UK celebrity editor for BuzzFeed and is based in London.
